## Project Submission

Your deliverable will be a link to your Flourish Talkies published to your Flourish Public account.

Your project must Meet Specifications in each category within the [Project Rubric](https://review.udacity.com/#!/rubrics/2544/view) in order for your submission to pass.

It can take us up to a week to grade the project, but in most cases, it is much faster. You will get an email once your submission has been reviewed. In the meantime, you should feel free to proceed with your learning journey by continuing on to the next module in the program.

atoms.text:
## Introduction

You are continuing your work as an analyst for the World Bank, understanding trends in global development by country and year. You have successfully created an interactive data story in your first project, and now your manager has asked you to take it to another level for a presentation in the auditorium.

## Project Overview

Your goal of this next phase of the project is to create an animated bubble chart, make a story out of it, and add audio to narrate the story. You will be using the same dataset from the mid-term project __energy_environment_economy.csv__ to build out your narrated story in Flourish.

## Dataset

We will be using the same dataset from the mid-term Project: World Indicators dataset. You may already have the dataset, but it is also available below under Supporting Materials, if you need it again. The dataset file is: __“Energy Environment Economy.csv”__ . The data set features annual data about 217 countries and territories from 1990 through 2014.  This dataset has been compiled from data sets originally sourced from the [World Bank](https://data.worldbank.org/indicator) data bank.

The data set includes the following fields:
* __Country Name__: Name of the country
* __Country Code__: 3 digit code for each country
* __Region__: The region of the globe the country is a part of (e.g. North America, Europe & Central Asia, etc.)
* __Income Group__:  Whether each country is part of the High income, Upper middle income, lower middle income, or Low income
* __Year__
* __Energy use__ (kg of oil equivalents per capita)
* __Population__
* __CO2 emissions__ (metric tons per capita)
* __Renewable energy consumption__ (% of energy)
* __GDP per capita, PPP__ (purchase price parity)
* __Electric power consumption__ (kWh per capita)
* __Access to electricity__ (% of population)
* __Forest area__ (% of land)

## Project Instructions #### To complete the project, you’ll need to complete the following tasks: A. Using the data set, create a new Bubble Chart in Flourish Studio
B. Import your data, choosing the data set for this project.
C. Create a Flourish story To create the __Flourish story__, you need to finish the following tasks:__ 1. Build a __bubble chart__ with the correct columns in the data for the following: * X values * Y values * Name * Color * Size and Shape (Optional) * Time field * Series to connect with line 2. Make sure the chart is animated across time and data and reflects the changes for each country. 3. Add the Bubble chart to the Story 3. Create at least three different tiles with the final tile animating the bubbles. 4. Add an audio to the Story. 5. Publish it to the web. ## Submission For your submission, you will submit the link to your data story published to your Flourish Public account.
